title: Flashlight Wear
summary: A free, effective, no-ads flashlight for your Android Wear watch.
description: This app turns your display into a soft, non intrusive flashlight for finding things in the dark.- No Ads- Say "Start a Flashlight" to start the app- Works great on both round and square screens- More features coming soon- It's my first published Android app ever, so your feedback and ideas are appreciated!
descriptionHTML:
This app turns your display into a soft, non intrusive flashlight for finding things in the dark.

- No Ads
- Say "Start a Flashlight" to start the app
- Works great on both round and square screens
- More features coming soon
- It's my first published Android app ever, so your feedback and ideas are appreciated!
comments: The only simple flashlight app for Wear on Play! You open the app, which opens faster than any other flashlight on Play,  and the white screen is immediately displayed. You swipe the app away and it's gone. No tapping to start the flashlight is needed. No strobe or color changing when you accidentally tap the screen. I love it for its simplicity.
